trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when an action is tried on a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 代表嘗試執行動作時，會擲回的例外狀況<xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>已刪除。

trans-unit.source: To delete a <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> method of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除<xref:System.Data.DataRow>，請使用<xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A>方法的<xref:System.Data.DataRow>類別。</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: As soon as you have deleted a row, any attempts to modify it will generate the DeletedRowInaccessibleException.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您已刪除資料列，任何嘗試修改它將會產生 DeletedRowInaccessibleException。

trans-unit.source: The DeletedRowInaccessibleException is thrown when you use one of the following properties or methods that try to get or set the value of a deleted <xref:System.Data.DataRow>: - <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> property - <xref:System.Data.DataRow.ItemArray%2A> property - <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> method Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to determine whether a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用其中一個的下列屬性或取得或設定已刪除的值再試一次的方法時，就會擲回 DeletedRowInaccessibleException <xref:System.Data.DataRow>:-<xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Data.DataRow.ItemArray%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataRow>類別，以判斷是否已刪除資料列。</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.ItemArray%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: If it has been deleted, you can use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Original%2A> method to retrieve it because deleted rows have no values available for the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Current%2A> state.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已被刪除，您可以使用<xref:System.Data.DataRow.Original%2A>方法來擷取它，因為已刪除資料列沒有可用的任何值<xref:System.Data.DataRow.Current%2A>的狀態。</xref:System.Data.DataRow.Current%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Original%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to determine whether a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataRow>類別，以判斷是否已刪除資料列。</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException"></xref> class with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException"></xref>類別，以指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to determine whether a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataRow>類別，以判斷是否已刪除資料列。</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string to display when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 要擲回例外狀況時顯示的字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException"></xref> class with serialization information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException"></xref>類別的序列化資訊。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 為要序列化或還原序列化物件所需的資料。

trans-unit.source: Description of the source and destination of the specified serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 來源和目的地指定的序列化資料流的描述。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.DeletedRowInaccessibleException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class to determine whether a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataRow>類別，以判斷是否已刪除資料列。</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況，則為 null 參考例外狀況 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 如果不指定了任何內部例外狀況。
